mainHeading.title: Remember to close any other applications before starting an appointment with {{ subject.givenName }}

mainBody.paragraph1: For example, Outlook, Teams or NDelius.
mainBody.paragraph2: You must do this to avoid sharing sensitive information.
mainBody.paragraph3: You must not let {{ subject.givenName }} use your device either.
mainBody.checkBoxLabel: I confirm I'll close any other applications before starting an appointment

confirm-privacy-checkbox.isNotEmpty: Confirm you'll close any other applications before starting an appointment
